Title: Dossier: Verify the file with the document type .WPD converts successfully and identical to the original file
Expected Result: - The document should appear identical AND there should be no loss of features/functions for document properties should behave as in the original
Overview:
This ticket is to capture the QA testing required to qualify the Neevia replacement.  This portion of the testing will ONLY cover document conversion--NOT the access to 
the updated conversion service from multiple areas of the product.
Steps:
1. Proxy Dossier Admin


2. Go to Materials menu


3. Click the 'Add File'


4. Upload the .WPD file for simple docs using the option' Browse To Upload' or 'Drag & Drop'


5. After uploading, choose the Type


6. Click on Add button


7. Repeat steps 3 to 6 to upload .WPD file for complex docs


8. Verify the conversion is successful and status should change to Received with Time stamp


9. Click on the file and verify that the reader should show the document


10. Verify there is no error in the console


11. Download the file (original/PDF format) and verify the document is identical to the original document

Title: Dossier: Verify the Add File - Video file (YouTube or Vimeo Videos)
Expected Result: Request with the Video file got uploaded successfully to the Material list and contains the information
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Add File - Video file (YouTube or Vimeo Videos)
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Material must be available - Videos
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Materials' menu
3. Click on 'Add Files' button
4. Verify you are on the Add file pop up screen
5. Select 'Video' tab from the Add file screen
6. Enter a title for the Video in Title textbox (Validate and ensure that Title are mandatory fields are indicated by an asterisk (*) symbol.)
7. Verify the entered title shows green tick in the textbox
8. Select a Type of video from the dropdown menu (Validate and ensure that Type are mandatory fields are indicated by an asterisk (*) symbol.)
9. Verify that the selected video type displays in the type section.
10. Enter the URL for the youtube video (Validate and ensure that URL are mandatory fields are indicated by an asterisk (*) symbol.)
 NOTE: Video URL should entered from https://www
11. Verify that the entered URL shows green tick in the textbox
12. Enter paragraph of text about video under the description
13. Verify the hover near the description which states (Add text here to describe or provide context for your video)
14. Verify the 'Add' button is enabled
15. Click on 'Add' button
16. Verify the following message: ""1 FILE WAS SUCCESSFULLY ADDED TO YOUR DOSSIER"" with green background
17. Verify that the user should be navigated to ""My Materials"" 
18. Verify that the added video is displayed under ""All Materials"" section with provided title, type and status

Title: Dossier: Verify the My Materials -  Sorting functionality
Expected Result: Materials should be sorted based on the selected grid.
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the My Materials -  Sorting functionality
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Material must be available
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Materials' menu
3. Verify the Materials is added in 'My Materials' page
4. All the existing materials will be displayed under 'All Materials' section with the number of available materials.
5. A text field with 'search' icon, 'Filter' button and 'View Archived Materials' link should be displayed.
6. Select any required column in the grid table

Title: Dossier: Materials - Download PDF/Docx files
Steps:
Select DOCX for download, compare to original

    Selelct PDF for download, compare to original

A/C 

0 - seed the data thru the API (see other tickets for re-usable code here)

 1 - verify the 2 most commonly used file types supported (DOCX,and PDF)

2 -  verify the success message on download

3 - Compare the downloaded to the original, i.e., do file compare with the original 

Docs should be identical

4 - Data cleanup should remove the documents from the materials collection

Title: Dossier: Verify the file with the document type .PDF converts successfully and identical to the original file
Expected Result: - The document should appear identical AND there should be no loss of features/functions for document properties (Bookmark/footers/TOC/Multiple Fonts/Cross Reference/etc.) should behave as in the original
Overview:
This ticket is to capture the QA testing required to qualify the Neevia replacement.  This portion of the testing will ONLY cover document conversion--NOT the access to 
the updated conversion service from multiple areas of the product.
Preconditions:
- Simple docs: https://interfolio.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SDEV/pages/2567504003/Simple+-Test+Documents
- Complex docs: https://interfolio.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SDEV/pages/2596634625/Complex+-+Test+Document 


These data should be included in the file       


- Bookmark 


- Footer 


- Cross Reference (Footnote, link to other entry) 


- TOC 


- Index 


- Tables 


- Multiple Fonts (including expanded charsets foreign, math, etc) 


- Encryption/Password protection 


- Embedded images
Steps:
1. Proxy Dossier Admin


2. Go to Materials menu


3. Click the 'Add File'


4. Upload the .PDF file for simple docs using the option' Browse To Upload' or 'Drag & Drop'


5. After uploading, choose the Type


6. Click on Add button


7. Repeat steps 3 to 6 to upload .PDF file for complex docs


8. Verify the conversion is successful and status should change to Received with Time stamp


9. Click on the file and verify that the reader should show the document


10. Verify there is no error in the console


11. Download the file (original/PDF format) and verify the document is identical to the original document

Title: Dossier: Verify the My Materials - Add tag in Material title
Expected Result: Requesting to adding a tag in material which got applied to material successfully in the Material list and contains the information added by the user for the tag
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the My Materials - Add tag in Material title
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Material must be available
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Materials' menu
3. Verify the Materials is added in the 'My Materials' screen
4. Click on '+' icon in any required material 
5. Verify the tags dropdown list is displayed & ""Add new tag"" button is displayed 
6.  Click on 'Add new tag' button in dropdown screen displays 
7. Verify the 'Add New Tag' popup window is displayed with the following:
   - Name (Mandatory Field)
   - 'Save' button
   - 'Cancel' button
8. Enter the required name in the name 
9. Click on 'Save' button
10. Verify the added tag is displayed in the materials

Title: Dossier: Deliveries - Apply to FS position
Expected Result: A dossier user can apply to any Interfolio posted position
Preconditions:
1. An open position exists in Faculty Search for a tenant (institution)
2. You have access to an FS admin user with permissions to view that open position
3. The current user is a Dossier user

*these should not be the same user
Steps:
1. Log in as a Dossier user
2. Navigate to Deliveries then select ""New Delivery""
3. In the ""Find an Opportunity"" text box, search for the FS open position you wish to apply to (use a substring of the position name)
4. Select the position from the list
5. Click Start Application button
6. Add any required documents/files and click Next
7. Verify Name & Address, Highest Degree Earned, Receiving Institution, and Date Earned values. (these will be pulled from the Dossier user's profile) and click Next
8. Enter required data into any forms that are shown and click Next
9. On the Review & Submit screen, click Submit Delivery. The packet should be submitted successfully.  
10. Return to the Deliveries screen and verify the application submission appears under the ""Sent Deliveries"" section.
11. Login as an FS admin in the tenant where the position originated 
12. Go to Faculty Search / Positions and open the position to see candidates
13. Verify the Dossier user shows as an applicant with the correct date of application and is listed as application Complete

Title: Dossier: Deliveries - Verify a flagged (red exclamation mark) when unfulfilled requirements in a delivery application
Expected Result: User should be able to see the red exclamation mark on the right Application Steps navigation area
Overview: Verifying that unfulfilled requirements in a delivery application are flagged (red exclamation mark) on the right Application Steps navigation area.
Preconditions:
1. Logged-in user has a Dossier (free tier) account.
2. User is subscribed to Dossier Deliver
3. User has already started the Application and it should be displayed under In Progress Deliveries.
4. User has unfulfilled requirements
Steps:
1. Log in to the Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to the 'Deliveries' menu
3. Verify the Deliveries page should be displayed, with the 'New Deliveries' button.
4. Select the 'Edit' button against the selected job application under the In progress Deliveries.
5. Verify the red exclamation mark should be displayed in the Application Steps

Title: Dossier: Deliveries - Verify the applications by navigating the Application Steps
Expected Result:
1. 'Application Submitted' message should be displayed.
2. Application details should be moved to the Sent Deliveries section.
Overview: Navigating the application by using the right navigation section “Application Steps” instead of using the Next/Previous buttons.
Preconditions:
1. Position that has required Document Requirements
2. Logged-in user has a Dossier (free tier) account.
3. User does not need Dossier Deliver to apply
4. User does not need to add as an applicant in the Position
Steps:
1. Login to the Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to the 'Deliveries' menu
3. Verify the Deliveries page is displayed, with the 'New Delivery' button
4. Click 'New Delivery
5. Under 'Find an Opportunity' type the title of the position partially in the search field and click 'Select'
6. Select the position for the application and click 'Start Application'
7. Documents section will be displayed and the user needs to add documents by selecting the 'Add Documents' button
8. 'Add File' window will be opened for uploading new/existing materials to add  
9. After the material is selected, click on Add button and the material will be added in the Documents section.
10. Select 'Personal Information' in the Application Steps
11. Fill out all required fields under Personal Information
12. Select 'Forms' in the Application Steps
13. Fill out all required fields under Forms
14. Review the application in the 'Review and Submit' section
15. Select 'Submit Delivery'
16. Confirm the application is submitted by clicking the 'Deliveries' button to view the application under 'Sent Deliveries'

Title: Dossier: Deliveries - Verify the User's account settings/Profile in the Personal Information is correct
Expected Result: Verify the prepopulated data from the User's account settings/Profile in the Personal Information must be correct.
Overview: Validate the data prepopulates correctly from the user’s account settings/profile in the Personal Information section of the application.
Preconditions:
1. Logged-in user has a Dossier (free tier) account.
2. User does not need Dossier Deliver to apply
Steps:
1. Login to the Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to the 'Deliveries' menu
3. Verify the Deliveries page is displayed, with the 'New Delivery' button
4. Click 'New Delivery
5. Under 'Find an Opportunity' type the title of the position partially in the search field and click 'Select'
6. Select the position for the application and click 'Start Application
7. Documents section will be displayed and the user needs to add documents by selecting the 'Add Documents' button
8. 'Add File' window will be opened for uploading new/existing materials to add  
9. After the material is selected, click on the Add button and the material will be added in the Documents section.
10. Select 'Personal Information in the Application Steps

Title: Dossier: Collections - Create a collection
Expected Result: Created collection should be displayed in collection list with correct name
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Collections - Create the collection
Preconditions: 1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
Steps:
1 - Login as a Dossier User 
2 - Navigate to Collections  
3 - Click ""Add Collection""  
4 - Name the collection and click Add so it is created
5 - Verify collection has been created

Title: Dossier: Collections - Add a material to a collection
Steps:
1. Log in as a Dossier user
2. Navigate to Material
3. Select existing collection 
4. Add existing materials to the collection

Title: Dossier: Collections - Rename a collection
Expected Result: Edited collection name should be displayed in collection list
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Collections -  Rename the collection
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Collection must be available
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Collections' menu
3. Verify the Collection page should be displayed, with added collection
4. Click on 'Select' option for any required collection in list
5. Verify 'Rename' & 'Delete' option dropdown should be displayed
6. Click on 'Rename' button in dropdown
7. Verify Edit Collection popup window should be displayed
7. Verify existing collection name should be displayed & 'Save' button should be disabled
8. Enter required values in name field 
9. Verify 'Save' button should be enabled
10. Click on 'Save' button'

Title: Dossier: Collections - Delete a collection
Expected Result:
1. Collection name should be deleted in collection list
2. Materials should be removed from the collection
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Collections - Delete the collection
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Collection must be available
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Collections' menu
3. Verify the Collection page should be displayed, with added collection
4. Click on 'Select' option for any required collection in list
5. Verify 'Rename' & 'Delete' option dropdown should be displayed
6. Click on 'Delete' button in dropdown
7. Verify Confirm popup window should be displayed with following:
   - Are you sure you want to delete ""(Collection Name)""? Materials will be removed from the collection, but will remain available in ""All Materials.""
   - 'Yes' button
   - 'No' button
8. Click on 'No' button in popup window
9. Verify collection list page should be displayed
10. Click on 'Delete' button in dropdown
11. Verify Confirm popup window should be displayed with following:
    - Are you sure you want to delete ""(Collection Name)""? Materials will be removed from the collection, but will remain available in ""All Materials.""
    - 'Yes' button
    - 'No' button
12. Click on 'Yes' button in popup window

Title: Dossier: Collections - Search materials by title
Expected Result: Materials titles should be displayed as per search term with type and status details.
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Collection - Search Materials by Title
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Collection must be added in Material
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Collections' menu
3. Verify the Collections list page should be displayed
4. All the existing Collections should be displayed under Collections list page section 
5. Click on any required collection name in the Collections list page
6. Verify the text field with 'search icon', 'Filter' button and 'Add Materials' button should be displayed.
7. Enter the required Title of the material in the search text box. 
8. Verify the 'Results with' section will have the search criteria which is entered in the search box as keyword with 'x' button. 
9. Verify the 'Clear All' button should be displayed.
10. Verify the search results on the page.

Title: Dossier: Collections - Search materials by single type
Expected Result: Materials titles should be displayed as per search term with type and status details.
Overview: As a Dossier (free) user, Verify the Collection - Search materials by type
Preconditions:
1. The current logged in user has a Dossier (free tier) account
2. Material must be available
Steps:
1. Login to Dossier (free) account
2. Navigate to 'Collections' menu
3. Verify the Collections list page should be displayed
4. All the existing Collections should be displayed under Collections list page section 
5. Click on any required collection name in the Collections list page
6. Verify the text field with 'search icon', 'Filter' button and 'Add Materials' button should be displayed.
7. Enter the required Type of the material in the search text box. Pick a SINGLE type so that only one type displays in the list.  
8. Verify the 'Results with' section will have the search criteria which is entered in the search box as keyword with 'x' button. 
9. Verify the 'Clear All' button should be displayed.
10. Verify the search results on the page.

Title: Dossier: Collections - Remove a material from a collection
Steps:
1. Log in as a Dossier user
2. Navigate to Collections
3. Select existing collection 
4. Remove existing material from the collection
